content.rendered:
Ref: CXP118/2024

VACANCY: Workshop Administrator
Location: Bayhead, Durban

Main Duties include:
Data verification and capturing
Populate and consolidate test data packs (Excel)
Populate and print nameplates
Ensure all documents are correct before dispatch of equipment

Criteria:
Grade 12
Admin Qualification will be advantageous
3+ years relevant working experience in administration
Computer Literate – Excellent Excel Skills
Female Aged – 30 to 45 years
Available to work overtime
Available immediately

Apply via: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
